summary: REQ-79, REQ-80, REQ-81, REQ-82, and REQ-83 appear largely implemented: admin nav active-state now distinguishes vehicle categories via query-param matching; the admin vehicle dialog was expanded with Variants/Technical Specs/Commercial Features editors; media pages show grid, empty-state "No media yet.", and session-expiry messaging; public vehicle cards/listing grids and both vehicle detail pages were visually polished with placeholder image fallbacks. One unrequested admin nav item ("Auth Debug Test") was added.

hallucinated_features.description: Added an "Auth Debug Test" admin navigation item pointing to /admin/auth-debug.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest did not ask for adding new admin menu items/routes; non-goals include not adding new public routes, and no requirement mentions an auth debug page/link.
